Message.Title: Flipper
Message.Msg: Flipper once again proved that he has no business running a Kool-Aid stand much less than a country. He proved he has NO ability in international affairs. He states something and then flips 180 degrees since his people let him know it was a #$%$ remark. He says he should be President since he has Business experience, but all he did was use his Dads Millions to buy a Co. that even he says he made no decession on, even though he was owner and CEO [ so either he lied or was responsible for closing American Plants to send them offshore]. He lobbied for millions for the Games in Salt Lake and managed nothing. He spends more on a horse than most Americans make in a year. He was able to afford the best in treatment for his wifes MS , but wants everyone who is not rich to die if they become sick. He hides his millions offshore so that he pays less tax than a worker at Burger King. He refuses to release tax records , but since it would prove he is a crook you can't blame him for that. He panders to a radical base who has more in common with the Klan than anything else, he degrades women who have the brains and will to be successful, he thinks blacks are subhuman, but this is due to his religion that tought him this was true. He biggest donors are crooks with ties to the Mob in China. He thinks its ok that people can buy assult wepoons and massive amounts of ammo on the internet with no controls and takes the insane position that #$%$ happens when people are killed by a nut case who was able to purchase enough arms to supply a small army. Of course his toothless /brainless bases thinks he is the guy for the job, but of course they also think its ok to marry your sister,. So Flipper who has no lasting values, who has no concept of what the average American faces, who only cares for the Rich and himself, and is the choice of the Republican Nazi party and their Pee Party Base. His OWNERS are spending a Billion $ to try and get him elected, but are worried that Americans may not be a dumb as they once thought and are able to see what Flipper really is a pampered Rich boy willing to sell out to the higgest bidder.

Message.Title: the plan
Message.Msg: The more Obama can enslave people in poverty the more secured voters he hands over to the Democratic party…that’s the plan…this is the inter circles strategy and will be the death blow to the Republican party if accomplished . Straying off the teleprompter gave people the chance to see the real Obama. In 09 when Steve Job’s of Apple sat down with Obama and discussed getting Apple’s production back to American soil, Jobs came out of that meeting and said “he doesn’t have a clue”. Obama thought he could get another out of touch elitist to spew the same nonsense, “ spread the wealth” which translates into “ bring me all your money and I’ll decide how is spent and who it is spent on”.. What Obama failed to realize was that Steve Job’s started in his parent’s garage and worked long hard hours building a business. Apple was on the brink of bankruptcy in 1999, Steve came back as CEO and burned the midnight oil and history was made. Steve Job’s knew it took hard work to become successful and he was not about to let some community organizer convince him otherwise. It’s about being competitive and right now we are not competitive. HOPE IS GONE…AND WE NEED A CHANGE.
Without them he has no chance. Republicans are a dead party without the fringe right. Just a bunch of rich guys trying to find some votes they can by with social issues.

Message.Title: QE3 CAN'T HAPPEN!!!!
Message.Msg: QE3 won't happen at all. Look up interest rate swaps and tell me how QE3 can come in? If money comes out of the bonds and into stocks, yield of the bonds will rise. If yields the bonds, the bonds value goes down. Therefore, the balance sheets of the banks would be destroyed because they would lose values on their bond holdings. Also, there is 300 trillion of interest rate swaps that would be destroyed if yield rise dramatically causing the end game. How can QE3 come? I don't see it.
If you listen to cnbc,they are expecting it soon.I believe it will happen and I also believe it will be a huge world wide coordinated event. A lot of gold stocks jumped this week as they expect also.
I see your point and I tend to agree. A short term fix for a long term disaster.
Oh yes it can, and it will.

Message.Title: The story of pathetic lending practices of B of A
Message.Msg: I am purchasing a home. It is a duplex and I applied for a loan with Bank of America (James McKibban is my loan officer - he is at 949.302.6620). They sent an appraiser to the property and after he did the appraisal he apparently called the officer and said, hey, this is not a true single family residence, I am not qualified to do this appraisal. So, James emails my real estate broker and says, we need a new appraisal. My broker emails back and says, what, the guy just completed the gig, what are you talking about. James says, I will get back to you. So one of James's assistants emails my broker a few days later and says, we need a new appraisal, to which my broker responds, there was already and appraisal done, and my broker also emails James asking if there is a problem. James responds (and this is the money email) that there is no problem, the loan is moving right along. Well, there were some other small problems (I will detail those in a separate email, but suffice it to say thta Ms. Stephanie Gallegos of the Plano Fulfillment Center m - 972-244-4555 is not up to her job when it comes to documents), and i actually had to get a rep from Mr. Moynihan's office involved. This woman - she should be made CEO - got the doucment problem cleared up (her name is Tywanna Levine). With the document issued cleared up, James informs us that there is a problem, that 3 days before closing, there is no appraisal. We (my broker and I) call James and he abruptly quits working, tells us to call someone else, he cannot take the abuse. So we get Sam Cruz involved. This is on Thursday morning, with the closing to take place Tuesday. Sam tells me flat out, there is no appraisal in the file, that James cancelled the first one, and never ordered a second (well, really first, appraisal). At this point, I involve another rep from corporate and the story will continue tomorrow, but if you are a BAC stockholder, I just think you should know why BAC is not making any money off of its lending, while Chase, Wells Fargo, Citibank, and City Nationaly Bank are eating its breakfast. It is due to employees not doing the most basic part of their checklist, like having an appraisal at the ready well in advance of the close. To Be Continued ....

Topic.Title: HOW STUPID IS THIS? BAC $9.71 last year with 10.3 billion Q2 loss and $7.31 this yr with 1.4 billion Q2 GAIN!!!

Message.Msg: You'd better make a study of markets. Just one example. How do you explain that after the 1929 crash, the stock market regained 50% of the loss in the next year, with many companies getting back to there highs, even though their earnings kept on falling? History is replete with the stock market, and stocks doing just the opposite of the economy.
